website_summaries.verdict: A super-comfortable balaclava for moderate winter temperatures in the teens and 20s that fits like a second skin under a helmet.
pros: Comfortable, thin material that makes this easy to wear underneath a helmet, with a fleece lining for comfort
Mesh fabric over nose and mouth make breathing easy and prevent speaker from being muffled
cons: Glasses fog easily when nose piece is in place

customer_reviews.title: Warm, and glasses friendly
customer_reviews.text: This balaclava is nice and warm, and glasses (or goggles) friendly! It's getting colder in the northern climes and higher elevations, and as a trucker I often need to get out and work in these colder areas. Add in my biking and scooting hobbies, and this is perfect for everything! It even fits inside my helmet.
customer_reviews.author: PhoenixCodes

customer_reviews.title: Perfect protection from the cold
customer_reviews.text: Perfect amount of warmth and protection from strong winds and cold weather! I highly recommend this! It gets so cold in Norfolk walking to work, and I wear this to protect my face from the chill! It works like a charm. I even wear it to workout outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: L. Ward

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money!
customer_reviews.text: The fit is terrible and when you exhale your glasses fog, even at speed (I ride a motorcycle). It’s okay warm but nothing like it’s advertised. It isn’t made for Americans typical head shape either (intermediate oval). I don’t recommend it for motorcyclists or anyone wearing goggles that needs to see where they are going.
customer_reviews.author: Joel Wade

customer_reviews.title: Hubby approves
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband who is working outdoors in North Dakota for ten hours a day. The temps have been in the single digits, and below 0 recently, and the wind has been significant. While it is a little big on him, he said it helps tremendously, and he would like a back-up in case he loses or forgets this one. He likes this one the best out of all the ones he has tried. It's lightweight, multi-functional, and does good protecting against the biting cold wind. I will be buying another one for him in the near future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary M.

customer_reviews.title: Kept me warm
customer_reviews.text: This will definitely keep my fave from freezing when I am out shoveling snow , or sledding with my son. It was easy to put on and stays in place over my nose . It’s not super heavy but it kept the wind and cold from my face while I was outside . It covers everything except my eyes , so even my ears were kept warm. And it can fit just about anyone
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: What's a nose?
customer_reviews.text: If you are an adult that possesses a nose, this will help you feel like an idiot that just bought a face-belt. And I have a small head. Becoming a challenge to wear more than 15 minutes, the poor design sneaks up on you. Very aesthetic, severely uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: Won’t protect your ears like you expect.
customer_reviews.text: Fogs my goggles. If you pull down the mask portion it does not protect your ears. It’s not comfortable and the brand is printed on the forehead and people think it says shrek at first glance.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works out great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for hunting and the atv. At first I thought it was too thin, cold temps would penetrate on the atv. But it was thin enough to wear a cap and that kept me warm. When hunting, a cap with a visor is nessary and this works out great. It will fog your glasses, but you can pull it down below your nose and that works.
customer_reviews.author: Photodog

customer_reviews.title: Great warmth.  Needs some improvement for breathing.
customer_reviews.text: The fit is excellent. I felt that the mesh at the nose needed to be more open / porous as it would be hard to breathe during physical activity. I modified the nose area to provide an opening for the nostrils to be able to draw more air when breathing heavily. Otherwise I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable wind-proof balaclava
customer_reviews.text: Material is wind-proof and to some degree water repellent. It may be too thin for winter activities but is a good choice for fall and spring with temperatures around 40th. I like the design of it where top part can be easily pulled back off the head leaving the mask part still in place. However, I wish that mask part of it had a tighter fit to the face especially at the eyes and nose line. Price is on the expensive side of what I'd expect for such a product. Good for fall and early spring outdoor activities like hikes, fishing, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Vlad

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for Covid 19. I am a bus driver and I needed to wear something that would keep my face warm and still be looking girly. Now don't think it is girly. Its a unisex mask. Its very warm and its comfy. I was afraid it would be itchy and heavy. Its not.
customer_reviews.author: Marie R Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really protects from the wind
customer_reviews.text: This is extremely warm which is super handy. It blocks the wind so I felt so much better being out in the wind. It is definitely not the most attractive piece of outerwear- but it does the job!! It is fairly comfortable- not as comfortable as fleece or other soft pieces of clothing - but it is not uncomfortable-
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Watson

customer_reviews.title: Head warmer
customer_reviews.text: This product is well lined with fleece material to keep the heat in and the cold out. This is a well made product that I will be using for outdoor running. I enjoy the fact hat it covers 90% of my face to protect it from the inclement weather. It allows full range of motion to the head and neck comfortably. It is a little larger than preferred, but that should be expected because some other users prefer additional or large size turtle neck garb underneath. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, works as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: Balaclava was comfortable, even under a helmet. Keeps the cold weather out but is breathable. We did not experience any wet weather, but the balaclava stayed dry while snowmobiling.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy C Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Need to improve fitment
customer_reviews.text: This face mask does work, it does keep your ears and head warm, I use it in a -20% freezer, the problem is it fits very loose around the nose letting cold air to get in and freeze your nose off, and because its loose, it moves around when your bending over and cover your eyes, if the fitment was better it would be 5 star
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Batman?
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic ninja / batman looking ski mask. If you are in cold or freezing temperatures, work graveyard or evening shifts and need this, it is a fantastic product. I live in Southern California and as soon as I started working day shifts in 75 - 90 degree weather, I could not wear it. Highly recommend if work colder outdoor security shifts, but do not recommend if needed for any day shifts in moderate degree weather. Need a thinner version for moderate weather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will keep head warm and not bulky.
customer_reviews.text: Not the cutest face mask but keeping me warm!! I bought one for my kid too, fits her big as expected but nevertheless doing the job of keeping is warm.
customer_reviews.author: Flor

customer_reviews.title: Not heavy insulation
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly light balaclava, and it is made of seemingly durable and lightweight materials. It will not keep you snug in very low temperatures, but when paired with a muff hat or sock cap, etc. the continuous coverage provided by the full mask still helps a lot in overall heat retention while not heavily restricting breathing or eyesight. I wore this while walking in the Montana winter, along with some other cold gear, and found it a valuable part of my cold gear as well as easy to store and put on. It can also be worn as a hat or warm collar if the weather heats up, or folded up and put into a pocket or knapsack.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky James Moore II

customer_reviews.title: Probably a good product, I have too big of a nose!
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, my challenge is that I have a larger than average nose. I expect that for those with a reasonable sized nose it would work just fine. Because this product is designed to cover the nose completely when pulled all the way up my nose gets squished. I tried this an a different product and it is obvious that I need a product with a cut for the nose
customer_reviews.author: JZ

customer_reviews.title: It is ok
customer_reviews.text: So I used this on a windy day and was outside in 30 degrees for 30 min. It was warmer than not having it on but it was not "warm" if that makes sense. Given the opportunity to buy it again, eh maybe. I just feel like the wind cut in too much and the expelled breathing did not, expel, and was going to get wet fast.
customer_reviews.author: Lost Pathfinder

customer_reviews.title: 5 STAR BALACLAVA
customer_reviews.text: THIS BALACLAVA IS WONDERFUL FOR FREEZING AND HIGH WIND CONDITIONS. THE LOWER PART IS LONG ENOUGH TO COVER YOUR NECK AND THUS WHEN YOU ZIP THE COAT UP YOU HAVE A GREAT WIND BREAK. I HAVE FOUR DIFFERENT BALACLAVAS AND THIS SIRECK BALACLAVA IS NUMBER 1.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Ward

customer_reviews.title: Not that big.
customer_reviews.text: Alot smaller then folks said it was. Pretty tight on the face. I had planned to use this on my motorcycle under my helmet but dont know if i can stand how tight this mask is for long amounts of time. Kinda disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: James price

customer_reviews.title: Balaclava
customer_reviews.text: appears to be nice quality.... only problem I see, is that it is pretty tight on my big head ,,, I have a larger head and can't find hats or masks that are comfortable
customer_reviews.author: CHRIS GROOMS

customer_reviews.title: Still warm in -16°F
customer_reviews.text: This balaclava is phenomenal! I work in a freezer at -16°F for around 4 hours per day and needed an upgrade from a beanie-like balaclava. There is absolutely no contest. When I enter the freezer, my nose hairs freeze and turn into tiny icicles; not anymore. The area covering my nose and mouth stays warm and slightly moist. The fleece on the inside is quite nice. Even after 4 hours in -16°F my head still manages to produce some sweat with this balaclava. It was slightly snug when I first put it on, then it loosened up a bit, molding into a perfect contour of my head. Worth every cent!
customer_reviews.author: Dillon

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great fit! Comfortable and not suffocating! The only issue I have with it is my glasses fog up due to the fabric over the bridge of the nose is loose fitting so ya gotta be a mouth breather! Haha. However, it is warm, does what I need it for and it is glasses friendly! Damn worth the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Stray_Cat

customer_reviews.title: Great Fit!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Man, I've had many different types of face masks but by far this is #1 to me. How it goes on the the feel and fit of it is awesome. It fits prefect over my many Bernie's and that's huge for the work I do. I already told my friends they need to order this one here.....
customer_reviews.author: Sedric Russell

customer_reviews.title: It works!!!!
customer_reviews.text: When it gets cold in Hawaii, we like to believe it's colder than it actually is. No ninja here!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works for this Quarantine
customer_reviews.text: My husband love his. It works as he goes to grocery store and to pick up meals for us.
customer_reviews.author: Travell U Bennett

customer_reviews.title: I have an average size head and found this too loose.
customer_reviews.text: I have an average size head and found this too loose. I bought this as a covid mask, but it doesn't hold over my lower face easily without falling down. Good fabric - would be a good mask if it fit right.
customer_reviews.author: Peter Gearhart

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Good fit. Easy to breathe but not well enough for hiking I feel. Held the neck portion under the sink tap for a few seconds, never felt water come through. I plan to use this during cold weather camping, I think this is a good investment
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 4 star item
customer_reviews.text: This thing keeps my neck and face very warm to hot. Can’t keep it on for long. I know it’s not super cold where I live but I’m only wearing it at around 20-25 degree temps. The only down side to this is when wearing glasses the warm breath fogs them up due to the opening just under my glasses.
customer_reviews.author: Rodney

customer_reviews.title: Made to keep your head nice and warm
customer_reviews.text: The winters out here are brutal and sometimes forty below zero but this head cover will do the job because of the material is made with. I highly recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: Don Gallegos

customer_reviews.title: Fits big heads only
customer_reviews.text: I have a 6 7/8 hat size, this is to big and looks dumb when I wear it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed bc it looked so cool
customer_reviews.text: Fit well but didnt stop the cold air blowing through so didnt really keep my face warm. But it was a snow storm? But that's what I got it for so 🤷‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: The House

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Pleased with the quality and fit. I wanted one with breathing vents and this works. Fits well under bicycle and ski helmets. Neck coverage is very good. I haven’t had really cold weather yet to try it out but am confident it will do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Thom Thibeault

customer_reviews.title: The bad outweighs the good
customer_reviews.text: The nose part is not well ventilated and fogs my googles. Fits fairly well and does keep my head warm. Will be going back to my ancient knit mask.
customer_reviews.author: Willee

customer_reviews.title: Covers all the important parts perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: Super warm! My husband loves this for snowmobiling, or working outside in the cold. He’s in construction and often builds in the cold New England weather. With this product there’s no adjustments needed. Covers perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jjcote222

customer_reviews.title: As described
customer_reviews.text: Went for a ride 300 mile ride where's the Mojave Desert and my face is warm I lived on the Wind in the grass identify up on me pretty good I would recommend it to anybody
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Valdez

customer_reviews.title: Nice full face mask for winter
customer_reviews.text: This is excellent for many purposes during the winter. I use this for snow blowing as it keeps the majority if not all of the cold snow off my face.
customer_reviews.author: Randall T. Lors

customer_reviews.title: Does the Job!
customer_reviews.text: As someone who has been working outside recently in the Northeast. This was a must needed purchase and believe me, I am not disappointed... Keeps me warm, and can always add other layers!
customer_reviews.author: Lenny

customer_reviews.title: Good head protection
customer_reviews.text: Good head protection . Good quality. A bit snug but great for protection and warmth
customer_reviews.author: RICHARD SLEDGE

customer_reviews.title: False advertising
customer_reviews.text: Only thing i like is it's breathable /it's too tight to put on it's also not warm as advertised i put this on on a cold night the top of my felt like i had nothing on my head.the picture of this looks thicker it's not at all thicker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One of the warmest hats you’ll ever own!!!
customer_reviews.text: This warm weather headgear is extremely warm and comfortable! It fits perfectly and is nearly wind proof- a must buy for those cold blustery days or nights!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Will keep you warm
customer_reviews.text: This is my second pair! I purchase it to get ready for the winter. It feels good, nice material and affordable
customer_reviews.author: BelL Belahouel

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made Baclave
customer_reviews.text: This Baclave is thicker and warmer than my old Baclave and tighter on the face which makes eye vision better. I like it very much
customer_reviews.author: Efren Ramirez Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Too warm???
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this thing is warm. Maybe too warm. Cozy down in the 20's, too warm I think for the 30's. But great quality and price. I am happy with this balaclava.
customer_reviews.author: chris van over

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and snug on the face. Looks exactly as depicted. Nice material. Will be using for extreme bicycling at night. The mask felt great simply because it seems to be slightly loose on the face as apposed to tight and in your eyesight.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. T

customer_reviews.title: Works well
customer_reviews.text: It works pretty well. I like the fact that I can take the mouth covering down. It also is plenty long and covers the neck
customer_reviews.author: C

customer_reviews.title: Very Warm
customer_reviews.text: Having sat outside in sub 0 temps for a few hours, whilst photographing a football game, I can honestly say this kept the whole of my head warm
customer_reviews.author: Bulldog

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect fit. Feels great and breathes well. Haven’t used it in the rain yet but works very well in the cold.
customer_reviews.author: esolorio04

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable fit.
customer_reviews.text: This feels nice when I put it on and it provides optimal protection from the cold and wind. It is lightweight and easy to clean. It really protects my face without impeding my vision.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Cold weather gear
customer_reviews.text: This is life-saver for cold weather work. Warm and very comfy. Wear around my neck most of the time, but would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Dar

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the cold weather coming so I haven’t had a chance to try it out yet since it hasn’t been cold enough. It does look to be exactly what I wanted and I can tell it’ll keep me warm.
customer_reviews.author: John Justice

customer_reviews.title: Pretty cool, lightweight. Warm
customer_reviews.text: It's very light weight and it does a pretty good job keeping my head warm. I have a pretty big head if I'm being honest so my only complaint was how difficult it was for me to put on personally 😅.
customer_reviews.author: gabe taylor

customer_reviews.title: Wind stopper
customer_reviews.text: Came fast packaged well keeps me warm by the while working at the Hudson River in the winter it’s brutal
customer_reviews.author: BuiltinWestchester

customer_reviews.title: Good item so far
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of this one fit a little looser than the other but seams to be well made haven’t used it yet but I think it will be nice when I ride my ATV.
customer_reviews.author: Big dog1

customer_reviews.title: Fits a big head, Elastic enough, Glasses friendly, Perfect for North-Eastern Winter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a friend of mine as a Christmas present. His head is big and he wears glasses. He works as a roofer where he has to face extreme cold and wind. It is elastic enough to fit any size head but not too tight. Great for cheating wind and keeping your face/head warm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Great balaclava...must have in frigid windy weather
customer_reviews.text: Great balaclava. I would rate this as one of the better ones I've seen. Well made with ample coverage of face and throat. Would definitely buy again
customer_reviews.author: Vivek

customer_reviews.title: Nice fit
customer_reviews.text: Well made balaclava! Fitment was great, look forward to using it in extreme weather conditions to keep me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Stieg

customer_reviews.title: Great Mask to Wear for CVID-19
customer_reviews.text: The mask fits perfectly over nose and mouth, while still enabling you to breath. Wearing this mask for CVID-19 honors the CDC guidelines, and I must mention is very stylish compared to your average face mask. It is perfect to wear if it is cold and raining, but you need to get out during the CVID-19 Pandemic. I would definitely buy this again!
customer_reviews.author: Rayshaun Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Recieved in less than 2 days, looks nice. I'll test it in the winter. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: Happy Buyer!

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great for driving in cold or cool weather when your trying to get to you fishing or hunting spot. Material feels good also
customer_reviews.author: Jessica beason

customer_reviews.title: Solid product, kept my ears perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the cold days. A little loose depending how much you move it, but that’s a trade off that I’ll take any day to be able to quickly slide down face mask and slide whole thing down over neck.
customer_reviews.author: Craig A Veitinger

customer_reviews.title: Order up a size
customer_reviews.text: Size a bit small. Recommend a size bigger. Other than that good quality product
customer_reviews.author: John M

customer_reviews.title: Keeping my head warm during the winter
customer_reviews.text: The Sireck cold weather balaclava is warm and comfortable. The fit is good. The fabric is breathable and helps keep the warmth in.
customer_reviews.author: ronald j gamache jr

customer_reviews.title: Good Value
customer_reviews.text: I've only worn this a few times but it seems durable and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Ray N

customer_reviews.title: Fits a larger size head
customer_reviews.text: Warm head cover, and a good choice for people with large noggins. Recommended
customer_reviews.author: .eagle fire

customer_reviews.title: Worth the buy!
customer_reviews.text: Easily accessible for neck and face cover, definitely recommend if you’re in sub-freezing temps.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Listen

customer_reviews.title: Works
customer_reviews.text: I am sure this mask will handle anything that winter has to offer
customer_reviews.author: PaulOne

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Keep you warm.. Thicker material than the piece of crap I bought at Walmart
customer_reviews.author: Rocky

customer_reviews.title: Don’t use this to Rob folks.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome for outdoor use in the cold, or if you work in a plant that’s super cold.
customer_reviews.author: Alexsandra Banner

customer_reviews.title: great fit
customer_reviews.text: This thing really fits me great. I haven't used it in the cold yet but it fits perfect under my ski helmet and goggles for ZERO skin showing. Its a little tight under my motorcycle helmet but I think it will work. Looking forward to the first crappy day I need to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I can breath again!
customer_reviews.text: I like the breathing mesh over the mouth. It keeps the condensation from building up and from fog forming my my glasses. Very warm and easy to wear in different configurations.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Warm and Great to Have
customer_reviews.text: It does keep me pretty warm in the winter but any time I walk near a bank or store people stare. Not really a joke, actually happens.
customer_reviews.author: Devaclia

customer_reviews.title: Does its job
customer_reviews.text: This mask did keep my head warm and its very lightweight and fits great.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent shield
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be warm enough. Glasses still fog up while wearing
customer_reviews.author: cpakk

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: Makes too much noise to use for hunting. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: bill

customer_reviews.title: Good all around warm ski mask
customer_reviews.text: I really like this very much, the only thing is with the front face mask up, my breath seeps out towards the top and it fogs up my glasses. I use this for walking outside in cold weather, not for actual skiing so a true ski mask may work better, but otherwise it is a very warm mask and fits my large head well.
customer_reviews.author: Godzilla

customer_reviews.title: C9ld weather gear
customer_reviews.text: I believe with a half helmet this will be really good
customer_reviews.author: alan mydland

customer_reviews.title: Loose fit.
customer_reviews.text: Was not adjustable. And was kind of bulky and moved around. I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and warm
customer_reviews.text: As someone who works outside, I wore this all winter and my face stayed warm the whole time! At some points it was about 40 degrees outside and I had actually started to sweat a little bit. Definitely loved my mask for the cold weather! If mine ever gives out I will most likely order another one of these.
customer_reviews.author: zachary lederman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Its warm love it i work with water so works great
customer_reviews.author: Marco

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase awesome mask
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit keeps my head ears and face warm and dry. Definitely recommend this for any outdoors activity that is done in the cold weather! Breathing through it is very good wasn’t hot or irritated with it being on for hrs! Very good but for me
customer_reviews.author: AR1079

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Keeps the wind and cold out. Fits well.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie Kowalski

customer_reviews.title: Quality product people
customer_reviews.text: I work out side everyday. I’ve tried several different kinds . When this one came up during my search for a reasonable price . I bought it because it looked cool . It’s the best one I’ve ever worn . Durable on the outside and lined with soft fleece on the inside . Quality product people !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: a great ski mask
customer_reviews.text: I used it in -12 to -15 degree and it was really great comfort and warmth. I can recommend buying it
customer_reviews.author: Hassan

customer_reviews.title: Good warm and fits well.
customer_reviews.text: Very good fit, comfortable to wear and keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Wagoner

customer_reviews.title: A must have for winter activities
customer_reviews.text: II bought it before the COVID-19 quarantine but it was great to use during the crisis for riding outdoors!
customer_reviews.author: Don Phelan

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: feel good, very warm. the only thing is that one size don't fit all. would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Great for winter sports, not so great for outdoor athletics.
customer_reviews.text: It’s nice for winter sports and motorcycle riding but I prefer a lighter one for running unless it’s getting into the 20’s Fahrenheit or below.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Balaclava Times2
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are very pleased with this product thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: R@g3’!nSou!3!7

customer_reviews.title: Versatile product, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This Balaclava is an excellent buy for the price, you can wear it as a full head gear or you can pass the cap back and use it only as a face protector. it's lightweight. but it's weatherproof and very warm
customer_reviews.author: Dave C

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't fit right
customer_reviews.text: Personally didnt really like it I mean I still use it but its not that comfortable
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: We loved this, worked great for snowmobiling. Fits great under helmet
customer_reviews.author: Catrina

customer_reviews.title: Life saver
customer_reviews.text: My husband works in a warehouse with meats. So the temperature is very low like a freezer. He works 12hrs shifts. This helps him out a lot. Very good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Allen

customer_reviews.title: Great use in Construction!
customer_reviews.text: I work in concrete construction. So I'm constantly in the cold winter, all day. As soon as I put it on, I'm warm, and I stay warm. Wind resistant, easy to wash. Even with the mud. Very dependable. Would recommend this to all my coworkers. Fits perfectly under my hard hat too!
customer_reviews.author: Malachi Fowler

customer_reviews.title: It is a good balaclava mask that can be used in winter.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: 1. Quality of material is good. 2. It has a separate air vent which prevents from fogging of the eye ware. 3. Affordable 4. Multipurpose use. Can be used while driving and in cold climates. Overall great purchase for upcoming winter
customer_reviews.author: Scitech

customer_reviews.title: Weird fit and poor breathing
customer_reviews.text: Water resistant, but it’s fit is subpar and the cap part is disproportionate to the rest of the mask. Breathing is tough in the mask. Breathing in is decent but when you exhale your breath has no where to go. Overall not worth the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Woodard

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy!
customer_reviews.text: It appears to be very well made and fits great! Looking forward to using it on our snowmobiling trip in February!
customer_reviews.author: Janny

customer_reviews.title: Warm and snug
customer_reviews.text: Breathable mesh that covers the mouth snuggly but still has slack to comfortably push under chin for clearer talking. The hood is very warm and tucks into most of my collared coats well.
customer_reviews.author: kevincmundy

product_meta.title: Sireck Cold Weather Balaclava Ski Mask, Water Resistant and Windproof Fleece Thermal Face Mask, Cycling Motorcycle Neck Warmer Hood Winter Gear for Men Women
product_meta.description:
Srieck Waterproof Balaclava Hooded Hat Windproof Fleece Thermal Full Face Ski Mask Motorcycle Neck Warmer Men Women's Winter Gear

Occasion applicable: Skiing, Snowboarding, Cycling, Motorcycle, Hunting, Hiking, Climbing, Camping, Airsot paintball, Tactical training, CS, Outdoor worker etc...

Features:
1. Full face cover mask gear, this winter balaclava is made from lycra and high quality thermal fleece to protect head, face, nose and neck from cold. With stretch fabric so that it can domfortably fits for most sized heads of men and women. 
2. Water resistand ski mask, the fabric is water resistant except breathable part, but it is not full waterproof, so please don't use in light rain for a long time or use it in heavy rain.
3. Windproof athletic mask, the fleece thermal windproof fabric blocks wind and cold air and keep head warm and comfortable when doing sports outside.
4. Lightweight and multi-way use, the lightweight material will let you feel free and easy to wear, it can be worn under bike/motorcycle helmet and construction site helmet. This balaclava motorcycle mask also can be used as neck scarf, bandana and winter cap.

Informations:
Brand: Sireck
Name: Hooded Balaclava Hat Ski Mask
Material: Lycra + fleece
Color: Black
Size: one size fits most sized head
Included:
1 x balaclava
feature_bullets: WATER RESISTANT & WINDPROOF FABRIC - This Balaclava hood is made from water resistant and windproof fleece thermal fabric to effectively reduces the cold index. But it is not full waterproof, it is okay in the light rain but not long time.
BREATHE FREELY - This full face mask has a breathable mesh design on the nose and mouth part so that you can breathe freely while still keeping warm.
UNISEX BALACLAVA HAT - Stretchable fabric to fits most heads, it is a good winter gear for men and women.

GOOD DESIGN - It is a multi-fuctional balaclava mask, such as, neck warmer, cold weather face mask, head protection from cold, wind, sprinkle and dust. It can be used as neck scarf, bandana and winter cap. The black color can match almost each kind of design and color of clothes.
GOOD CHOICE IN WINTER FOR - Skiing, Snowboarding, Cycling, Motorcycle, Hunting, Hiking, Climbing, Airsot paintball, Tactical training and so on...
